name: socha_graphical_client
description: New approach to a graphical client for the software-challenge-application

scripts.test: sed -i 's/amd/commonjs/' tsconfig.json; node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --compilers ts:ts-node/register,tsx:ts-node/register; sed -i 's/commonjs/amd/' tsconfig.json;
scripts.get-dependencies: cd libs; echo 'Downloading require.js'; wget http://requirejs.org/docs/release/2.3.2/minified/require.js; cd ../tools; mkdir chutzpah; cd chutzpah; echo 'Downloading chutzpah'; wget -O chutzpah.zip https://github.com/mmanela/chutzpah/releases/download/v4.2.4/Chutzpah.4.2.4.zip; unzip chutzpah.zip; rm chutzpah.zip;
